concept.title: 210.002 PROCEDURES.

conbody.p: (e)(i) When contracting for services, see PGI 210.070, for the “Market Research Report Guide for Improving the Tradecraft in Services Acquisition”.
(ii) See PGI 210.002(e)(ii) regarding potential offerors that express an interest in an acquisition.
(iii) Follow the procedures at PGI 210.002(e)(iii) regarding contract file documentation.
